Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
AutoHoldStateHandlerThis class is responsible for placing a connected call on detect human hold, including recording, muting mic, playing a wav loop, detecting a DTMF tone, alerting the user if a human is detected, monitoring call connection state, and restoring the connection and mic upon retrieval or human detection
ConnectedStateHandlerThis class is responsible for user options and connection state handling when in a normal call connection (as opposed to one of the hold modes)
DialStateHandlerThis class is responsible for obtaining a SIP number from the user, initiating dialing, and confirming success or failure of the connection
DisconnectStateHandlerThis class is responsible for disconnecting a call
ExitStateHandlerThis class does nothing
HoldStateHandlerThis class is responsible for placing a connected call on standard hold, including recording, playing a wav loop, presenting user options, detecting user commands and responding those commands and connection state appropriately
MenuStateHandlerThis class is responsible for displaying the simple menu presenting 'call' or 'quit' options and responding to either command
RegisterStateHandlerThis class is responsible for initializing telephony and registering the user with an SIP registrar, including gathering SIP account information from the user, initiating registration, and verifying successful registration
StateHandler
TeleKarma
TelephonyIfcThis class is the interface between telekarama and the Opal telephony library
